author: sdeboy
msg: logpanel now implementing profileable - this is the mechanism for log panel settings save/load

author: sdeboy
msg: specify resize weights for split panes so that the event table is given the extra space on window resize

author: sdeboy
msg: if receiver panel is set to hidden on startup, set divider size to 0

author: sdeboy
msg: - receiver panel now in a jsplitpane and can be resized
- replaced 'logger tree' button in menu with magnify icon
- modified menu item descriptions and order in log panel's context menu
- renamed any variables named 'enum' (a keyword as of java 1.5)
- changed default settings - tooltips are no longer enabled by default
- replaced SHIFT_DOWN_MASK with SHIFT_MASK in logpanel's find shortcut to maintain jdk1.3 compatibility
- corrected shutdown behavior - now setting default close operation to DO_NOTHING
(previously when prompted to shut down, if user chose 'no', UI would go away but

author: sdeboy
msg: Changed label describing 'level precision' property - which now asks for the number of levels to hide (with a logger of org.apache.log4j.spi, setting this value to 3 will display 'spi' as the logger name)
